item.title: Need Help with some stuff please mod as reward ;)
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

Ok well specify permanant objects loaded from server side or clientside object spawning? i can do both :D[br][size=1]Posted on: February 22, 2007, 02:06:15 AM[/size][hr]in your client.java to have objects spawn with the server you need to make a void… i.e. example

public void objectspawn() { AddGlobalObject(2645, 9738, 1747, 1, 10);//ladder AddGlobalObject(2791, 10089, 4407, 1, 10);//lvl2 portal AddGlobalObject(3261, 3423, 1307, 1, 10);//maple AddGlobalObject(3265, 3426, 1307, 1, 10);//maple

or with… making temporary objects and such… put this code in your client.java near any command that resembles checkip or male or female.

} if(command.startsWith("makeobj")){ try { int id = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(8)); AddGlobalObj(absX, absY, id, 0, 10); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Bad Object ID"); } }

Read full topic
